results.t: How can I access the ChatGPT API?
results.p: To access the API, visit the OpenAI Platform and sign up or log in. The ChatGPT API allows developers to integrate ChatGPT into their own applications.

results.t: How to get your ChatGPT API key (4 steps)
results.p: How to get your ChatGPT API key (4 steps) · Step 1: Create an account · Step 2: Generate an API key · Step 3: Set up billing · Step 4: Set usage limits.
